alert.note: Alert for Forrest; Lamar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 7:03PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN FORREST AND NORTHEASTERN LAMAR COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM CDT... At 703 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Hattiesburg, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hattiesburg, Petal, and Sunrise around 710 PM CDT. McLaurin around 720 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
